questions.question_text_1: Amit took a survey of a group of 32 college going students (consisting only of male and female students) to know whether they own a smartphone or not and he got to know the following information.   (i). There are 3 males who do not own a smartphone. (ii). There are total 27 females. (iii). There are total 26 students who do not own a smartphone.  Based on the above information, answer the given subquestions.
